name: Keep the dinosaur alive
description:
Your objective is to keep the dinosaur alive by jumping over the obstacles! 

Now with 2 new biomes for you to try it out!

Press SPACE key to jump.

 Everything was done by myself using Unity Engine, Aseprite, Bosca Ceoil and SFXR.

If you can leave some feedback below in the comments, I will be glad to read and answer!

Have fun!
